Perplex: Did any of you hear something? Like a crash?...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, December 29, 2000 8:17 PM
Subject: Obfucious


> OOC: I'm feeling rather ill which may explain this post.  I feel oddly
> creative.
>
> ::Obfucious::
>     His stasis pod careened (isn't that a great word) out of space
crashing
> into the mountain next to Windlord's base.  (I know he's not there but
there
> isn't a better name for it.)  His beast mode was that of a crane.  (You
know,
> the bird that stands on one leg.)  He stepped out and found that in the
crash
> his logic circuits were scrambled, but he was in perfect condition other
than
> that.  Unfortunately all he could do was give pearls of wisdom.  Now all
he
> could do is make things unclear with those "pearls of wisdom."
>
>
>
>
